description: Simple, fresh and bursting with flavour, these delectable barbecued honey-dressed peaches with haloumi and oregano are ready in just 10 minutes.
keywords: Barbeque,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Lemon,Sesame free,Summer,Halal,BBQ,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Jan Feb 2022,Peach
name: Honey-Dressed Barbecued Peaches & Haloumi Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a greased barbecue flat plate on medium-high heat. Brush peach and haloumi with half of the oil and cook for 2 minutes on each side or until lightly browned and warmed through.
Place lemon juice, honey and remaining oil in a small jug and whisk to combine. Season with pepper.
Arrange peach, haloumi and lemon wedges on a board. Scatter over oregano and serve drizzled with dressing.
